project_abstract.cdata: The Shuikou Hydroelectric Project seeks to support economic growth in East China and Fujian province through development of a major hydroelectric site on the Min river. The project is the Bank's first involvement in the power subsector in Fujian province and the fifth Bank loan for development of the power subsector in China. The project comprises the construction of a 101 m high concrete gravity dam, spillway, powerhouse and navigation lock. It also includes provision and installation of seven generating units of 200 MW each, construction of a single-circuit 500 kV transmission line and installation of equipment at an associated substation. Further to this, the project entails provision of consulting services for design and construction management; resettlement of the reservoir area population and a program for its economic and social reestablishment; and carrying out of studies and a training program.

P003484.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>水口水电项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目力求通过开发闽江上一大水电基地支持华东地区和福建省经济发展。本项目是世行在福建省参与建设的首个电力项目，也是世行中国电力行业发展的第五个电力项目。项目具体内容包括：（1）建设一座101米高混凝土重力坝、泄洪道、厂房和船闸；（2）供应并安装七台200兆瓦发电机组；（3）架设单回路500千伏输电线路；（4）为一处配套变电站安装设备；（5）就设计和施工管理提供咨询服务；（6）开展库区移民，实施移民经济和社会重建工程；（7）开展研究和培训。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
